The Facebook post published on March 22: 2021, featuring three images of an old man celebrating his 150th birthday.
The inclusion of three images of an elde: suggesting a discrepancy in the claimed age.
Verification from reliable sources: such as news reports and Getty Images, confirming that the photos actually depict Mbah Goto, an Indonesian man who died in 2017 and was reported to be 146 years old at the time of his death.
